phase_1.goal: Initial prompt validation - does it work at all?
success_criteria: All 8 sections have data or explicit 'not found'
Classification is not 'INSUFFICIENT_DATA' (unless truly no data)
Premium course has more complete data than budget

section_1_classification: Classification is one of: BOTH, BUY, SELL, INSUFFICIENT_DATA
If BUY or SELL or BOTH, relevant signals array is not empty
section_2_water_hazards: If count > 0, details array should have entries
section_3_practice_facilities: Range type is one of: grass, mat, both, unknown
Source URL present for range data
section_4_decision_makers: At least 1 decision maker found (or empty array if truly none)
Each contact has name and title
If email found, it's work email (not gmail/yahoo)
section_5_course_tier: Classification is: premium, medium, or budget
Pricing data present (green fee OR membership)
Course type is one of: private, semi-private, public, municipal, resort
section_6_buying_signals: Array (can be empty if no signals)
Each signal has category from enum
section_7_course_intelligence: Source URLs present where data found
section_8_event_program: If true, details array should have entries
